trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp" /> and <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> routed events, as well as related attached and Preview events.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyUp" /> 和 <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.KeyDown" /> 路由事件的資料，以及相關附加事件和預覽事件。

trans-unit.source: This event data class is used with the following attached events:
trans-unit.target: 此事件資料類別會搭配下列附加的事件：

trans-unit.source: This event data class is also used with the following routed events on base elements.
trans-unit.target: 此事件資料類別也搭配基底項目上的下列路由事件。

trans-unit.source: These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這些路由的事件轉送，使其更容易存取一般項目模型中先前所列的附加的事件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data.
trans-unit.target: 附加的事件和基底的項目路由事件共用其事件資料，而反昇和通道之路由事件的版本也共用事件資料。

trans-unit.source: This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route.
trans-unit.target: 事件路由傳送，這可能會影響事件的處理的特性。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[輸入概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: A key can be in both the up and toggled states or the down and toggled states.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵可以是最新和已切換之狀態或在清單中，並切換的狀態。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, determining whether a key is up or down is not as simple as checking the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.KeyStates%2A> value as a numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，決定是否已啟動的索引鍵或向下不只要檢查<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.KeyStates%2A>以數值形式的值。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should check the value by treating it as a flag enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您應該檢查此值將它視為旗標列舉。

trans-unit.source: Use an `AND` comparison of the first bit.
trans-unit.target: 使用`AND`比較的第一個位元。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, use the helper properties <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsUp%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsDown%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsToggled%2A> to determine whether a given key is up, down, or toggled.
trans-unit.target: 或者，使用協助程式屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsUp%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsDown%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsToggled%2A>來判斷是否指定索引鍵已啟動、 關閉，或切換。

trans-unit.source: The logical keyboard device associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 與這個事件相關聯的邏輯鍵盤裝置。

trans-unit.source: The input source.
trans-unit.target: 輸入來源。

trans-unit.source: The time when the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: 輸入的時間。

trans-unit.source: The key referenced by the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件參考的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that is part of dead key composition to create a single combined character.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬於廢鍵組合 (Dead Key Composition) 之一部分的按鍵，以建立單一組合 (Combined) 字元。

trans-unit.source: The key that is part of dead key composition to create a single combined character.
trans-unit.target: 屬於廢鍵組合之一部分的按鍵，以建立單一組合字元。

trans-unit.source: A dead key, when pressed, produces no visible character but indicates that the key is to be combined with the character produced by the next letter key pressed.
trans-unit.target: 廢鍵，當按下，會產生任何可見的字元，但是會指出索引鍵是結合所產生的下一個字母按鍵的字元。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.Key%2A> returns <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.DeadCharProcessed?displayProperty=nameWithType>, you can use this property to get the actual key that was entered.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.Key%2A>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.DeadCharProcessed?displayProperty=nameWithType>，您可以使用這個屬性取得輸入的實際金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard key referenced by the event, if the key will be processed by an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 取得事件參考的鍵盤按鍵 (如果該按鍵將由[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ime](~/includes/tlasharptla-ime-md.md)] 處理)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> referenced by the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件參考的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the input source that provided this input.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供這個輸入的輸入來源。

trans-unit.source: The input source.
trans-unit.target: 輸入來源。

trans-unit.source: for getting the input source.
trans-unit.target: 取得輸入的來源。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.
trans-unit.target: 以特定型別的方式呼叫的泛型處理常式。

trans-unit.source: The target to call the handler on.
trans-unit.target: 對其呼叫處理常式的目標。

trans-unit.source: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.
trans-unit.target: 以型別專屬的方式叫用事件處理常式，這樣做能夠提升事件系統的效率。

trans-unit.source: This implementation casts the generic handler as a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler> and then invokes it.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會轉換為一般處理常式時為<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>然後再叫用。

trans-unit.source: For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A> and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需這項實作模式及它的理由的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.InvokeEventHandler%2A>和[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the key referenced by the event is in the down state.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出事件參考的按鍵是否為已按下的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key is down; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鍵為已按下狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class also provides information about the state of the keys on the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>類別也提供鍵盤上的索引鍵的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.IsKeyDown%2A> method returns whether a specified key is down.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.IsKeyDown%2A>方法會傳回指定之索引鍵是否已關閉。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether the key associated with an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> is down by obtaining the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsDown%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查是否索引鍵相關聯的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>所取得的狀態已關閉<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsDown%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the keyboard key referenced by the event is a repeated key.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出事件參考的鍵盤按鍵是否為重複的按鍵。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key is repeated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果為重複按鍵，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 它沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether the key associated with an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> is a repeated key by obtaining the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsRepeat%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查是否索引鍵相關聯的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>所取得的狀態是重複的索引鍵<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsRepeat%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the key referenced by the event is in the toggled state.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出事件參考的按鍵是否為已切換的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key is toggled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鍵為已切換狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 它沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class also provides information about the state of the keys on the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>類別也提供鍵盤上的索引鍵的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.IsKeyToggled%2A> method returns whether a specified key is toggled.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.IsKeyToggled%2A>方法會傳回指定之索引鍵是否會切換。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether the key associated with an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> is toggled by obtaining the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsToggled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查是否索引鍵相關聯的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>可以取得的狀態切換<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsToggled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the key referenced by the event is in the up state.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，這個值指出事件參考的按鍵是否為已釋放的狀態。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the key is up; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果按鍵為已釋放的狀態，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: There is no default value.
trans-unit.target: 它沒有預設值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class also provides information about the state of the keys on the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>類別也提供鍵盤上的索引鍵的狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: For instance, the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.IsKeyUp%2A> method returns whether a specified is up.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard.IsKeyUp%2A>方法會傳回是否指定已啟動。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether the key associated with an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> is up by obtaining the state of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsUp%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查是否索引鍵相關聯的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>取得狀態的已啟動<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsUp%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard key associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與事件關聯的鍵盤按鍵。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> referenced by the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件參考的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler> and checks whether the key associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> is the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.Return> key.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventHandler>，並檢查是否與索引鍵相關聯<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>是<xref:System.Windows.Input.Key.Return>索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the keyboard key associated with this event.
trans-unit.target: 取得與這個事件關聯的鍵盤按鍵狀態。

trans-unit.source: The state of the key.
trans-unit.target: 按鍵的狀態。

trans-unit.source: A key can be in both the up and toggled states or the down and toggled states.
trans-unit.target: 索引鍵可以是最新和已切換之狀態或在清單中，並切換的狀態。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, determining whether a key is up or down is not as simple as checking the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.KeyStates%2A> value as a numeric value.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，決定是否已啟動的索引鍵或向下不只要檢查<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.KeyStates%2A>以數值形式的值。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should check the value by treating it as a flag enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，您應該檢查此值將它視為旗標列舉。

trans-unit.source: Use an `AND` comparison of the first bit.
trans-unit.target: 使用`AND`比較的第一個位元。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, use the helper properties <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsUp%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsDown%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsToggled%2A> to determine whether a given key is up, down, or toggled.
trans-unit.target: 或者，使用協助程式屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsUp%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsDown%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.IsToggled%2A>來判斷是否指定索引鍵已啟動、 關閉，或切換。

trans-unit.source: The following example checks whether a key associated with an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs> is down by performing a bitwise `AND` comparison on the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.KeyStates%2A> of the key and the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyStates.Down> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會檢查是否索引鍵相關聯的執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs>是向執行位元`AND`上的比較<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyEventArgs.KeyStates%2A>索引鍵和<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyStates.Down>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the keyboard key referenced by the event, if the key will be processed by the system.
trans-unit.target: 取得事件參考的鍵盤按鍵 (如果該按鍵將由系統處理)。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> referenced by the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件參考的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" />。
